data.title: The Real Estate Radio Network launches South Florida Hot Listings
data.meta_description: The Real Estate Radio Network launches South Florida Hot Listings. South Florida Hot Listings will help consumers understand the real estate investment process, whether they are buying as first time home buyers, investors, or retirement home buyers. The show airs Sundays at 2pm ET on WSBR 740 AM Moneytalk Radio. - PR12217989
data.text:
South Florida Hot Listings will help consumers understand the real estate investment process, whether they are buying as first time home buyers, investors, or retirement home buyers. The show airs Sundays at 2pm ET on WSBR 740 AM Moneytalk Radio.

MIAMI - Sept. 28, 2013 - PRLog -- Real Estate Radio Network proudly launches “South Florida Hot Listings” hosted by Rosie Hernandez of Gold Rose Realty. South Florida Hot Listings will help consumers understand the real estate investment process, whether they are buying as first time home buyers, second home buyers, investors, or retirement home buyers. The goal of the show is to answer any and all questions you the consumer or investor may have about what the necessary steps are in a transaction, deadlines, inspections, escrow deposits, appraisals, types of financing options available, and so on. The show will air on Sundays at 2pm ET on WSBR 740 AM Moneytalk Radio and premieres Sunday, September 29th 2013. Listeners not in the Miami area may stream the show from Moneytalk Radio's site http://wsbrradio.com.

“I am really excited about bringing my listeners the information they need to make better real estate investment decisions. It's important for me to help them identify what type of property is the best fit for them based on their criteria,” said host Rosie Hernandez.

Rosie G. Hernandez is the founder and active broker of Gold Rose Realty, Inc. since 1996. Her ongoing networking and educational involvement with both consumers and real estate professionals have earned her the reputation of being an expert in the real estate industry with both her local and international market. She is an active member of the National Association of Hispanic Real Estate Professionals (NAHREP), the Miami Association of Realtors and the Woman’s Council of Realtors (WCR) to name a few. Rosie was awarded a contract with the Housing Urban Development (HUD) 2 years ago as a Local Listing Broker for both Dade & Broward county. She has since been certified by the Department of Business and Professional Regulations (DBPR) as a trainer for the “Successfully Selling HUD Homes” where she provides 3 continuing education credits to real estate agents who attend her course. Her duties also include providing buyers with educational seminars on promoting home ownership and lending awareness. Last year she was named Chase Scholar of South Florida and a Priority Partner for JP Morgan Chase Bank. She currently holds a certification as a “Certified Distressed Property Expert” and has a great track record in negotiating and closing short sale transactions in record time.

If you are interested in becoming a contributor to South Florida Hot Listings please contact Rosie at goldroserealty@ gmail.com or 305-244-4033. For more information on the show visit the website at SouthFloridaHotListings.com

The Real Estate Radio Network (RERN), founded in 2010, has prided itself on empowering listeners, which include home and business owners, property investors and soon to be first time owners, with the latest real estate knowledge so they can make informed decisions in an ever changing market. Additional focus is made on positive uplifting stories that happen all the time in the market. Growing every day, there are over 30 RERN hosts. For more information visit http://realestateradio.us.

End
